name: Beat Bobble
description:
NOTE: if you are unable to see the button to start the game on the title screen, try downloading the FixButtonPos build! This should only happen on devices with a resolution < 720p! Sorry!!

You're a doggy DJ at a boppin party! Can you keep time while dropping those sick beats into your decks to keep things moving!

Game for the Mix and Jam 2020 game jam. Heavily inspired by Zuma and osu!!

Controls:

Mouse - Aim

Left Click - Fire

Right Click - Swap to Next Color

Click on the beat to increase your multiplier! If you click off the beat, you lose your multiplier. Try to keep right clicking on the beat while you're thinking of your next move.
